title: $:/TiddlyDragon/templates/Monster
text:

title: $:/TiddlyDragon/templates/Stat Block
text:
@@.stat-block
Str Dex Con Int Wis Cha
{{!!str}} (<$view tiddler="$:/TiddlyDragon/data/Ability Modifier" index={{!!str}} />) {{!!dex}} (<$view tiddler="$:/TiddlyDragon/data/Ability Modifier" index={{!!dex}} />) {{!!con}} (<$view tiddler="$:/TiddlyDragon/data/Ability Modifier" index={{!!con}} />) {{!!int}} (<$view tiddler="$:/TiddlyDragon/data/Ability Modifier" index={{!!int}} />) {{!!wis}} (<$view tiddler="$:/TiddlyDragon/data/Ability Modifier" index={{!!wis}} />) {{!!cha}} (<$view tiddler="$:/TiddlyDragon/data/Ability Modifier" index={{!!cha}} />)
@@

<$list filter="[is[current]tag[Spell]]"> @@.spell

<$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!level" text="0">Level {{!!level}}, {{!!school}} <$reveal type="match" state="!!level" text="0"> cantrip <$reveal type="match" state="!!ritual" text="YES">(ritual) Classes: {{!!classes}}

Casting Time: {{!!time}}
Range: {{!!range}}
Components: {{!!components}}
Duration: {{!!duration}}
